micro_missiles.description: Shoot a flurry of tiny fire-particle missiles.

warper.description: Suddenly warp randomly around a target whilst fighting

firefangs.description: Summon a line of firey fangs

missile_laser.description: Launches a powerful flurry of missiles after warming up with a targetting laser

mancubus.description: Shoot a series of large fireballs

leaps.description: Mobs can make strong jumps that are higher or farther
